org.bubblecloud.zigbee.api.cluster.impl.api.general

Interface Scenes

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ZCLCluster
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ScenesCluster

    public interface Scenes
extends ZCLCluster
    This class represent the Scenes Cluster as defined by the document: ZigBee Cluster Library public release version 075123r01ZB
    Since:
    0.1.0
    Version:
    $LastChangedRevision: 799 $ ($LastChangedDate: 2013-08-06 19:00:05 +0300 (Tue, 06 Aug 2013) $)
    Author:
    Stefano "Kismet" Lenzi, Francesco Furfari, Alessandro Giari
